alert.note: Alert for Benson; Cavalier; Eastern Walsh County; Eddy; Grand Forks; Nelson; Pembina; Ramsey; Towner; Western Walsh County (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Wind Chill Warning issued February 22 at 9:36PM CST until February 23 at 12:00PM CST by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...WIND CHILL WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON CST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Dangerously cold wind chills. Wind chills as low as 45 below zero. * WHERE...Portions of northwest Minnesota and northeast North Dakota. * WHEN...Until noon CST Thursday. * IMPACTS...The dangerously cold wind chills will cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 10 minutes. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Areas of blowing snow may periodically reduce visibility at times, especially in open country. Use caution when out traveling this evening. While blizzard conditions will not exist in the Wind Chill Warning area, blizzard conditions will occur along and south of US Highway 200, so if you are planning to drive south, be aware of rapidly deteriorating travel conditions.
info.instruction: Avoid outside activities if possible. If outside, make sure you wear appropriate winter clothing.

area.areaDesc: Benson; Cavalier; Eastern Walsh County; Eddy; Grand Forks; Nelson; Pembina; Ramsey; Towner; Western Walsh County
